alert.note: Alert for Clarendon; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 5:57PM EDT until April 05 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Eastern Sumter County in central South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 556 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Santee Cooper Regional Airport, or 9 miles south of Manning, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Woods Bay State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Turbeville, Foreston and Shiloh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina. A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Conditions are favorable for tornadoes to form. For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows. Severe thunderstorms can produce large capsizing waves and frequent lightning. If on or near Lake Marion move away from the water and take shelter! A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central South Carolina.
